// Header.js import React from "react"; import { NavLink, Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useAuth } from "../../context/auth"; import toast from "react-hot-toast"; const Header = () => { const [auth, setAuth] = useAuth(); const handleLogout = () => { setAuth({ ...auth, user: null, token: "", }); localStorage.removeItem("auth"); toast.success("Logout Successfully"); }; return ( <>
